name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I excel in integrating **AI** and **ML** technologies into high-performance solutions across various sectors, including e-commerce, finance, and healthcare. My strong expertise in **Python** (including frameworks such as FastAPI and Django) and familiarity with deep learning frameworks like **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Scikit-learn** enable me to develop innovative AI-driven applications. I am proficient in utilizing cloud services like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, and I have a solid background in data handling using **SQL** and distributed computing technologies like **Apache Spark** and **Hadoop**. My experience in designing **APIs**, implementing **microservices**, and optimizing systems for reliability positions me to deliver enterprise-grade solutions. I am also skilled in data visualization tools such as **Tableau** and **Power BI**, alongside MLOps practices and CI/CD pipeline development, ensuring seamless project execution. I bring strong problem-solving abilities, effective communication, and project management experience using tools like **Jira** and **Confluence** to drive successful project outcomes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and implemented robust **AI** models using **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Scikit-learn** for predictive analytics and decision-making in healthcare environments, resulting in a **30%** increase in predictive accuracy.
• Led the creation of scalable **microservices** architecture utilizing **Python** and cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure**, improving the deployment speed by **40%** through **CI/CD** practices.
• Designed and integrated real-time **APIs** with a focus on secure data exchange, achieving compliance with **HIPAA** and enhancing interoperability with external healthcare providers.
• Spearheaded deployment of machine learning models into production environments using **MLOps** strategies, facilitating **24/7** operational readiness and reliability.
• Implemented **distributed computing** frameworks with **Apache Spark** to enable efficient data processing and analysis, handling datasets with over **1 billion** records.
• Created data pipelines utilizing **Azure**, **Kafka**, and **Apache Airflow** for efficient data ingestion and processing catering to both batch processing and **real-time** analytics.
• Championed best practices in AI ethics across projects, ensuring transparent and responsible use of machine learning technologies.
• Mentored a cross-functional team in the use of **Jira** and **Confluence** for agile project management, enhancing team collaboration and accountability.
• Improved data visualization and reporting capabilities using **Power BI** and **Tableau**, leading to a **25%** reduction in decision-making time through insightful analytics.
• Automated deployment processes and infrastructure provisioning using tools like **Terraform**, significantly reducing manual effort and errors.
• Collaborated with stakeholders to brainstorm innovative solutions, effectively communicating complex concepts and driving engagement for AI initiatives.
• Ensured the integrity and security of healthcare data through rigorous testing and implementation of security standards like **SOC 2** and **ISO 27001** in AI systems.
• Conducted rigorous testing and performance evaluation of AI models using frameworks like **PyTest** and **unittest**, ensuring high reliability and scalability of AI solutions.

Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services to deploy and manage scalable **AI** and **ML** models, enhancing infrastructure efficiency and reducing operational costs by **30%**.
Developed and integrated **Python** APIs with **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch** to implement deep learning algorithms for predictive analytics, improving project outcomes by **25%**.
Designed and deployed microservices architecture using **FastAPI** and **Django**, enabling modular development and continuous integration of new features, resulting in a **40%** reduction in deployment time.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps** for automated testing and deployment, ensuring high reliability and speed in the development cycle.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Jira** and **Confluence** for effective project management and communication, leading to enhanced team collaboration and reduced project delivery times.
Executed data processing jobs with **Apache Spark** and **Hadoop** to optimize large dataset handling, improving performance and utilizing distributed computing resources effectively.
Developed dashboards and reporting tools integrated with **Power BI** for unified visualization of AI model performance metrics, aiding decision-making processes across departments.
Ensured adherence to **AI ethics** and compliance in projects, utilizing best practices for data management and model deployment, fostering stakeholder trust and responsibility.
Applied **Scikit-learn** for building and validating machine learning models, achieving high accuracy in predictions and business insights from varied datasets.
Integrated advanced NLP techniques using **Langchain** and **Hugging Face** for automated text processing tasks, enhancing data ingestion capabilities by **50%**.
Conducted regular performance reviews and optimizations of AI models, leveraging advanced quantitative analysis strategies to maintain quality and efficiency in service delivery.
Mentored junior engineers on AI principles, fostering knowledge transfer and skill enhancement in the team, leading to improved team performance and project success.

Developed AI and ML models using **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch** to enhance backend services and improve user customization in e-commerce applications.
Leveraged data processing frameworks like **Apache Spark** and **Hadoop** to analyze large datasets, providing insights for product recommendations and inventory management.
Implemented **MLOps** best practices for continuous training and deployment of machine learning models, ensuring high availability and performance.
Designed and optimized backend services for an e-commerce platform using **Python** with microservices architecture (FastAPI, Django, Flask), enhancing scalability by **30%** and reducing latency.
Built robust **RESTful APIs** in **Python** to facilitate integration between AI models and backend systems for real-time customer interactions, supporting **10,000+** concurrent users.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, improving delivery speed by **25%** and ensuring consistent feature releases.
Utilized cloud platforms like **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** for deploying machine learning models, enhancing system robustness and deployment flexibility.
Constructed dynamic, responsive frontends using **React**, **Next.js**, and **Angular** with integrated **Python** backends, ensuring a seamless user experience across all devices.
Conducted performance testing with tools like **Apache JMeter** and **Locust**, achieving optimization of Python services to handle peak traffic loads effectively, demonstrating a **40%** improvement.
Integrated real-time monitoring solutions using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **Azure Monitor** to track performance metrics and ensure optimal system health and user satisfaction.
Developed data visualization dashboards in **Tableau** and **Power BI** for insightful reporting on customer behavior and system performance, facilitating informed decision-making.
Implemented security protocols such as **RBAC** and OAuth 2.0 in Python services, ensuring secure access for customers and administrative users.
Conducted extensive unit and integration testing using **PyTest** and **unittest** to maintain high code quality and reduce the occurrence of bugs by **20%**.
